content.text:
# List of presidents of Benin__disambig_1

This is a list of presidents of Benin (formerly Dahomey) since the formation of the post of President in 1960, to the present day.
List of officeholders

|Dahomeyan Unity Party (PDU)|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}

|Action Front for Renewal and Development (FARD–Alafia)|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}
